meanings.definition: A polygon with eight sides and eight angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew colorful octagons in my art class.
meanings.sent2: The stop sign is shaped like an octagon.
meanings.sent3: The octagons on the playground looked like giant cookies.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like shimmering octagons in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The octagons in the math book helped me understand shapes better.

meanings.definition: A shape with eight sides and eight angles.
meanings.sent1: The garden had flower beds in the shape of octagons.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry box had a unique octagon design.
meanings.sent3: The pizza slices were cut into tiny octagons for the party.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a maze of interconnected octagons, each representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The building's windows formed shimmering octagons when the sun hit them just right.
